TopicTitle: Solved - Remove Possibility of Tourism Contracts

Articles.Content:
Hi all!

I want to get rid of all tourist contracts. I've tried the contracts.cfg but this doesn't seem to have what I want - I removed the 'TOUR' section, but the ferry tourists is still there.

Rejector only does what it says on the can. It cancels contracts as they come up. I don't want them to appear at all!

Any clues, or help would be appreciated.

Peace.

Edit - [https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/897/StockNoContracts](https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/897/StockNoContracts)

This has what I wanted. The only issue with it is that I had to start a new career (having just started one).

I think that my editing of the contract.cfg may only have worked on a new save as even with this mod existing saves still had contracts appearing.

But anyhow, issue solved! Now onto building a new space agency!

Peace everyone.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-19T04:07:06Z" title="07/19/2015 04:07  AM" data-short="8 yr">July 19, 2015</time> by theJesuit**
  
Solved issue
What you're looking for IS [**Rejector**](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/108316-Rejector-v1-1-2). As far as I know there are no other mods capable of doing this.

Thanks Tex,

As I implied in the OP, Rejector only seems to cancel contracts as they come up, and at a rate specified in the settings. I don't want the contracts to appear at all!

I have looked at the contracts.cfg. Is there another place that the Tourism contracts will appear?

> 
> Edit - [https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/897/StockNoContracts](https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/897/StockNoContracts)
> This has what I wanted. The only issue with it is that I had to start a new career (having just started one).
> 
> I think that my editing of the contract.cfg may only have worked on a new save as even with this mod existing saves still had contracts appearing.
> 
> But anyhow, issue solved! Now onto building a new space agency!
> 
> Peace everyone.

Hello, no, you don't need to start a new career with stocknocontracts, you only need to cancel the current tourism contracts which are on your contracts list.

You had it right from the start. If you remove the "tour" section of contracts.cfg, they'll no longer show up. You just need to reject the ones already listed, or wait for them to expire. You can reject contracts without having to accept them first, for those that may not have known that.

I have no idea why it didnt work but even rejecting the contracts more still turn up after the removal of the tour section from the .cfg. It was most bizarre and made me wonder if the tourists were from elsewhere. I'm not a huge fan of editing the stock games files quite like that and nostock solved my issue. My latest save had only just orbited so it was no great loss. 

Thanks Malah and Targa.

Peace.
